actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Alcoholic Beverage Labeling Act of 1988 to prohibit additional statements and representations relating to alcoholic beverages and health, and for other purposes.
short_title: Alcoholic Beverage Label Preservation Act of 1999

summary.text: Alcoholic Beverage Label Preservation Act of 1999 - Amends the Alcoholic Beverage Labeling Act of 1988 to prohibit statements and representations relating to alcoholic beverages and health on alcoholic beverage containers and packages in addition to the one already required by such Act.

titles.title: Alcoholic Beverage Label Preservation Act of 1999
A bill to amend the Alcoholic Beverage Labeling Act of 1988 to prohibit additional statements and representations relating to alcoholic beverages and health, and for other purposes.
